name: Dungeon Dragons
description:
Introduction:

An adventure game, with turn-based combat where the goal is the go as far as possible into the dungeon. Hatch dragon eggs and use them as your fighting strength to survive. Keep affinities in mind as you battle, and keep your team alive as you progress.

Beware: This project is by far not complete, and contains many bugs and issues. Reload the game/browser if you get stuck.

HOW TO PLAY:

Move the character in the overworld by using W, A, S, D. If you get stuck on a puzzle, you can reset the level by clicking the reset button.

In combat, you can see who's turn it is by looking at the green circle, you may target an enemy elemental by using the mouse. Clicking on it, during your turn will attack it.
